ideas.title: ElevenLabs CEO says the voice AI startup crossed $330 million ARR last year
ideas.description: The company said it took only five months to go from $200 million to $330 million in annual recurring revenue.
hooks: How ElevenLabs turned $200M into $330M in 5 months?
Voice AI's Rocket Ride: ElevenLabs' Insane Growth Revealed
Behind the $330M: ElevenLabs' Unstoppable AI Strategy

tips: Enable live chat for real-time audience engagement
Use custom thumbnail highlighting revenue milestone

visualDirection.description: Dynamic split-screen with CEO interview and revenue graphics, bold tech-inspired color palette (electric blue, deep charcoal), animated revenue trajectory overlay, modern sans-serif typography with high-contrast data visualization, subtle motion graphics highlighting growth metrics

exampleOutline: Section 1: Live Stream Intro & Revenue Reveal
Section 2: ElevenLabs' Market Context & AI Landscape
Section 3: Detailed Revenue Growth Breakdown
Section 4: Strategic Insights & Future Projections
Section 5: Live Q&A with Audience Interaction

ideas.title: Apple launches ‘Creator Studio’ bundle of apps for $12.99 per month
ideas.description: The bundle includes access to Final Cut Pro, Logic Pro, and Pixelmator Pro on Mac and iPad, as well as Motion, Compressor, and MainStage on Mac.
hooks: Master Apple's Creator Studio in 10 Minutes
Unlock Pro Creative Tools: Step-by-Step Guide
Transform Your Workflow: Apple's Creator Bundle Explained

tips: Use screen recording to demonstrate actual app workflows
Create clear chapter markers for each app in the bundle
Include side-by-side comparisons of tools and pricing

visualDirection.description: Dynamic, tech-forward aesthetic with clean Apple-inspired white space, bold sans-serif typography, smooth motion transitions between app demonstrations. Use a cool blue-gray color palette with accent highlights. Incorporate clean screen recordings with subtle motion graphics overlays. Picture-in-picture of presenter for personal connection.

exampleOutline: Section 1: Dramatic Hook - What is Creator Studio?
Section 2: Breakdown of Included Apps & Value Proposition
Section 3: Detailed Walkthrough of Each App's Core Features
Section 4: Workflow Integration and Creative Possibilities
Section 5: Pricing Breakdown and Final Recommendations

ideas.title: Deepgram raises $130M at $1.3B valuation and buys a YC AI startup
ideas.description: Deepgram is raising its Series C round at a $1.3 billion valuation.
hooks: How One AI Startup Just Became a Unicorn

tips: Use archival footage of startup founders
Include dynamic financial graphics and data visualizations
Create chapter markers highlighting key investment milestones

visualDirection.description: High-contrast tech-inspired color palette (deep blues, electric teals, clean whites). Kinetic typography with financial data overlays. Dynamic motion graphics showing funding trajectory. Subtle parallax effects on archival images. Clean, modern documentary aesthetic with Silicon Valley tech documentary influence (think 'General Magic' documentary style).

exampleOutline: Cold Open: Dramatic funding announcement moment
Deepgram's Origin Story & Market Context
Breakdown of $130M Series C Investment
Strategic Implications of YC Startup Acquisition
Future Predictions & Industry Impact

ideas.title: Slackbot is an AI agent now
ideas.description: Salesforce unveils Slackbot, a new AI agent that allows users to complete tasks across multiple enterprise applications from Slack.
hooks: AI Just Transformed Slack: Your Ultimate Task Assistant
Slackbot's New AI Powers: Enterprise Workflow Revolution
Complete Tasks Instantly: Slackbot's AI Agent Explained

tips: Use screen recording to demonstrate Slackbot interactions live
Include picture-in-picture walkthrough of interface changes
Create chapter markers for each workflow demonstration step

visualDirection.description: Bold, tech-forward design with electric blue and deep navy color palette. Dynamic motion graphics showing workflow transitions. Clean, sans-serif typography with technical overlay animations. Minimal but high-contrast design emphasizing AI connectivity and seamless integration. References: Figma design system, modern enterprise UI trends.

exampleOutline: Introduction: What Makes Slackbot's AI Agent Revolutionary
Understanding the Enterprise Workflow Problem
Step-by-Step: Configuring Slackbot AI Agent
Live Demonstration of Cross-Application Task Completion
Future of AI in Enterprise Collaboration

ideas.title: Salesforce rolls out new Slackbot AI agent as it battles Microsoft and Google in workplace AI
ideas.description: Salesforce on Tuesday launched an entirely rebuilt version of Slackbot, the company's workplace assistant, transforming it from a simple notification tool into what executives describe as a fully powered AI agent capable of searching enterprise data, drafting documents, and taking action on behalf of employees.The new Slackbot, now generally available to Business+ and Enterprise+ customers, is Salesforce's most aggressive move yet to position Slack at the center of the emerging "a
hooks: AI Is Rewriting the Workplace: Slack's Wild New Move
Slackbot Just Got a Superpowered AI Upgrade
Enterprise AI Revolution: Inside Salesforce's Game-Changer

tips: Use dynamic screen recordings of Slackbot interface
Include side-by-side comparisons of old vs new Slackbot
Create animated graphics explaining AI workflow interactions

visualDirection.description: High-energy blue and electric teal color palette. Geometric motion graphics showing AI interactions. Clean, technical typography with rounded edges. Futuristic but approachable visual style. Picture-in-picture screen recordings with subtle parallax effects. Minimal design with bold informational highlights.

exampleOutline: Cold Open: Dramatic AI Workplace Transformation Teaser
The Enterprise AI Battleground: Microsoft vs Google vs Salesforce
Slackbot 2.0: Detailed AI Agent Capabilities Breakdown
How This Changes Knowledge Work Forever
Future of Work: Actionable Insights for Professionals
